name: Squibblies 3: Mucus' Revenge
overview: The post-SEUCK Compo entry released after the results of the Official C64 SEUCK Compo 2019. Squibblies's family has been captured by the evil ruler Mucus - who has thrown them into 4 different caves and left them stranded. Playing the role of Squibblies. You must recover your family. During your quest, you must fight against monsters, by throwing blobs at them. To make life easier for Squibblies, he has the ability to throw blobs at some of the enemies' weapons, including red balloons, grey bomblets and turds. Other objects cannot be destroyed. Collect coins and rescue caged villages in order to boost up your slime ball throwing ability and avoid getting hit by the monsters. Can you complete all 4 zones, and rescue all of your family members? Good luck Squibblies!
